DCMI Subject Vocabulary XML Schema
Created 2013-01-01
Created by
Eric Weig (eweig@email.uky.edu)
This schema defines a simpleSubject which enumerates the allowable values for the DCMI Subject Vocabulary for the Kentucky Digital Library. These are a local set of topics concerning Kentucky history. These terms on our part are an attempt to allow for the topic identification of materials for KDL display. These topics are meant to be utilized in combination with Keyword, LCSH (Library of Congress Subject Headings), TGM I (Thesaurus for Graphic Materials I), and TGM II (Thesaurus for Graphic Materials).
